## Description {#details}

This file contains both AMDGPU-R600 target machine and the CodeGen pass builder.

The target machine contains all of the hardware specific information needed to emit code for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/r600">R600</a> GPUs and the CodeGen pass builder handles the pass pipeline for new pass manager.

<SectionDefinition>
